name: Unwritten Dreams
description:
The reality behind dreams is that as long as you're asleep, you cannot write them down.

Scarlet awakens lost in a dreamworld. She must find her memories to complete the dream. Some memories will be real, but often in dreams it his hard to tell which memories are simply our imagination or unfinished desires tricking us into bliss or into fear.

HOW TO PLAY

Simply explore and discover memories. There are 4 memories to discover and a new location to find once all four are discovered. Press E to interact with memories.

WASD to move; hold SHIFT to run; CTRL to crouch, if you'd like.

HOW TO INSTALL

Download and install the zip file. Run the executable (application file) to play the game, and enjoy.
